class.name: mecanum_jacobian/JacobianController
class.description: A chainable controller for mecanum wheel robots that reads joint velocities, computes body frame velocities using Jacobian transformation, exports them as state interfaces, and publishes TF transform from odom to base_link.

class.name: mecanum_jacobian/InverseJacobianController
class.description: A chainable controller for mecanum wheel robots that takes body frame velocity commands (from topic or chained interface) and converts them to wheel velocities using inverse Jacobian transformation.
